name: Crayon Eater
description:
Crayon Eaters is a narrative postcard game for two players. 

The PDFs are made to be printed double-sided. Print it out, cut down the dotted line starting at the picture of the scissors, and stick the two sections together. There are two arrows on the end of one piece that should touch the two arrows on the other piece.

It folds up to have player one's move on one side and the address/message section on the other, and then the same for play two when they send it back.  

This game was inspired by an illustration by James Jean called Crayon Eater (2007).
